name: explorer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who travels to places where no one has ever been in order to find out what is there: Magellan was a famous 16th-century explorer.

Add to word list
a person who travels to places where no one has ever been to learn about them: French explorers traded with the Indians in many parts of North America.
